Node.removeChild()

children childNodes方法的区别

var el = document.createElement("div");
el.textContent = "foo"
el.childNodes.length === 1; // 包含text
el.children.length === 0; // 不包含text

replacedNode = parentNode.replaceChild(newChild, oldChild);
